title: East Playoff Race With Kevin Pelton
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Kevin Pelton about the red-hot Knicks, and the wild East playoff race -- play-in scenarios, the rising Wizards, the race for No. 4, Brooklyn's path, and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
